title: How to Win at NCAA Football 08 for Xbox 360

steps.headline: Find your team.
steps.description: If you are a big Notre Dame fan, pick Notre Dame. If you are a big Boise State fan pick Boise State. IF you don't have a favorite team, pick a team in which you have a favorite player. If you don't have a favorite player, pick a good team, top 25. If you don't find your team and just pick different teams you have a smaller chance of winning because you need to get used to one team's playbook and players or you will get confused.

steps.headline: Watch your team on TV to see what kind of playing style they have (how much they run/pass/option etc.)
steps.description: so you can learn to play to their strengths. This is especially useful for a team like Arkansas who utilizes the unique Wild Hog formation or Hawaii who almost exclusively uses the shotgun formation.

steps.headline: Start out by playing teams from smaller conferences if you are a big team, and just whoop on them to improve.
steps.description: If your team is from a smaller conference, play big teams and try to pull off the upset.

text: Find your team. If you are a big Notre Dame fan, pick Notre Dame. If you are a big Boise State fan pick Boise State. IF you don't have a favorite team, pick a team in which you have a favorite player. If you don't have a favorite player, pick a good team, top 25. If you don't find your team and just pick different teams you have a smaller chance of winning because you need to get used to one team's playbook and players or you will get confused. Watch your team on TV to see what kind of playing style they have (how much they run/pass/option etc.) so you can learn to play to their strengths. This is especially useful for a team like Arkansas who utilizes the unique Wild Hog formation or Hawaii who almost exclusively uses the shotgun formation. Start out by playing teams from smaller conferences if you are a big team, and just whoop on them to improve. If your team is from a smaller conference, play big teams and try to pull off the upset. Improve up to Varsity after you get the hang of the game.  Keep on playing and playing. Play Dynasty and Campus Legend too. Improve after you play a while.  Repeat the last step.
